name: AstroJam
description:
You're a spaceship pilot in a traffic jam. Avoid wrecking your vehicle or others or you'll pay for damage. Clearing asteroids gives you credits. Earn 2000 credits to win, go bankrupt and you'll lose! Good luck!

Made with Makecode Arcade for a jam and playable here: https://makecode.com/_d22Pvg91Deee

Controls

WASD/arrow keys: move

Z/space: shoot
